title: Got leaver buster cuz of bug splat
body: So I got a bug splat and it give me a leaver buster, I just want to know if this normal or no

replies.body:
Yes, this is normal if you had previously disconnected from a match. The [**Leaverbuster System**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) does not issue penalties for a single disconnection, but it does for consistent or frequent disconnections.

I recommend working through our [**Bugsplat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) for a list of steps that should resolve the issue causing them if you haven't already fixed the core cause. Let me know if you have any further questions.
